# MappingBitcoin.com

## About
MappingBitcoin is the largest open-source directory of Bitcoin-accepting merchants worldwide. We aggregate venue data from OpenStreetMap and enable businesses to verify their listings using Nostr, a decentralized identity protocol.

## What We Do
- Map and directory of 24,000+ Bitcoin-accepting venues across 150+ countries
- Business verification system using Nostr (decentralized identity)
- Community-driven data from OpenStreetMap
- Support for both on-chain Bitcoin and Lightning Network payments
- User reviews for venues (in development)

## Key Features
- Interactive map to find Bitcoin merchants nearby
- Browse by country, region, or category
- Business verification via email or DNS domain verification
- Open data: all venue information comes from OpenStreetMap
- No central authority: verifications are cryptographically signed
- Free for users and businesses

## Coming Soon
- User reviews: Rate and review Bitcoin-accepting venues using your Nostr identity
- Community trust scoring: Reviews weighted by social graph proximity to trusted community members
- Enriched data API: Programmatic access to venue data with reviews, verification status, and community trust scores

## Technology
- Built on OpenStreetMap for venue data
- Nostr protocol for decentralized identity and verification
- Supports Bitcoin (on-chain) and Lightning Network

## Structured Data (JSON-LD)
All pages include schema.org structured data for machine parsing:

- Home page: Organization, WebSite schemas with search action
- Venue pages: LocalBusiness schema with geo coordinates, address, payment methods, opening hours, amenities
- Country/region listings: CollectionPage with ItemList of venues
- Countries directory: ItemList of countries with venue counts

Schema types used per venue category:
- Restaurants, cafes, bars: Restaurant, CafeOrCoffeeShop, BarOrPub
- Hotels, hostels: Hotel, Hostel, LodgingBusiness
- Shops: GroceryStore, ConvenienceStore
- Services: LocalBusiness with specific subtypes

All venue schemas include:
- name, url, geo (lat/lon)
- address (street, city, region, country, postal code)
- paymentAccepted (Bitcoin, Lightning Network)
- telephone, email, website (when available)
- openingHours, amenityFeature (WiFi, wheelchair access)
- aggregateRating (when reviews available)

## How to Cite
MappingBitcoin.com - The Bitcoin Economy, Mapped
URL: https://mappingbitcoin.com
Source: OpenStreetMap contributors, Nostr protocol

## Contact
Website: https://mappingbitcoin.com
Contact page: https://mappingbitcoin.com/contact

## License
Venue data is sourced from OpenStreetMap and is available under the Open Database License (ODbL).
